Class Broker

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • components.Broker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, ManagementImplementationI, PublicationsImplementationI, SubscriptionImplementationI

    public class Broker
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements ManagementImplementationI, SubscriptionImplementationI, PublicationsImplementationI
    Classe representant le composant courtier
    Author:
    Bello Velly
